LanguageData.Nymph.label: Nymph
LanguageData.Nymph.description: A mysterious animal reconstructed from the Dryad archetype gene.
LanguageData.Oread.label: Oread
LanguageData.Oread.description: A mysterious animal that generates minerals at regular intervals.
LanguageData.Naiad.label: Naiad
LanguageData.Naiad.description: A mysterious animal that habit of injecting its own secretions liquid into cylinder.
LanguageData.Nerco.label: Nerco
LanguageData.Nerco.description: A homunculus with degenerated traits due to the activation of reproductive control genes.
